body_html: @ebetica: @cpuhrsch (channeling @Maratyszcza) and I discussed this, and now that mkldnn landed, there isn't any utility to building against NNPACK on x86. So we are going to just remove the NNPACK dependency altogether. For your workaround, can you just disable NNPACK? (And if you need fast CPU convolutions, turn on mkldnn)
